channel.title: Need a working minecraft client (for my mac)
channel.description:
I just download the client here:http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,487009.0.html
However, I got an error after I signed in and then it updated.
I haven't tried that client on my windows computer yet, only my mac so that may be the problem
If you could direct me to a client so I don't have to pay and I can play on my mac, I'd appreciate.
There wasn't really a help section so I posted here :P
EDIT: It worked fine on my windows computer so I just need one that works on my mac.

item.title: Need a working minecraft client (for my mac)
item.dc:creator: @noodleman_jr noodleman jr
item.description:
@noodleman_jr wrote:

Try this http://tryminecraftforfree.net/play.php

Read full topic
